items.title: Team
items.description: To know who create your site

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: It all started with a simple thought, on a summer afternoon in 2023: what if I built a studio capable of creating truly unique websites, tailored to every person? It was just a dream, but already a strong conviction.
about.paragraph2: For a year, I worked on my first site – a project that would eventually allow people to easily create customizable websites. A year of testing, coding, and countless nights imagining how to make the web more original.
about.paragraph3: After months of work, the site was finally deployed. The Fab Studio officially came to life. I created an Instagram account to share ideas and my first creations.
about.paragraph4: The Fab Studio was born of a desire to push back the boundaries of the web. A visual laboratory where innovation, aesthetics and interactivity meet to invent unique experiences.

footer.description: We are a french studio who develop websites for you

data.title: What data do we collect?
data.paragraph1: We collect personal data you voluntarily provide when you interact with our services. This includes your name, email address, and any information you enter into contact or newsletter forms.
data.paragraph2: Additionally, we use analytical tools like Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage statistics such as pages visited, time spent on the site, and referral sources. No sensitive or financial data is collected.

use.title: How we use your data
use.paragraph1: We use your data solely for purposes that improve your experience and communication. For instance, if you fill in a form, we may use your email to respond.
use.paragraph2: We analyze aggregated traffic data to understand user behavior and optimize the structure and content of our website. Your data is never sold or shared with third parties.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.paragraph1: Cookies are used to enhance your browsing experience. Functional cookies ensure smooth navigation and remember your preferences.
cookies.paragraph2: Analytical cookies help us gather statistics. You can refuse cookies at any time through your browser settings, though this may impact certain features.

security.title: Security
security.paragraph1: We apply security best practices such as HTTPS encryption, firewall protections, and regular audits to ensure your data remains safe from unauthorized access or exposure.
security.paragraph2: We never store your data on publicly accessible platforms.

retention.title: Shelf life
retention.paragraph1: Your personal data is stored only as long as necessary. Contact data is retained for a maximum of 12 months after the last communication unless legal obligations require otherwise.
retention.paragraph2: Analytical data is anonymized and used indefinitely for statistical purposes.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.intro: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have several rights concerning your personal data. You may:
list: Request access to the data we hold about you.
Ask for corrections if the data is inaccurate or outdated.
Request the deletion of your data under specific circumstances.
Withdraw your consent at any time, particularly regarding cookies or marketing communication.
rights.conclusion: To exercise any of these rights or if you have concerns about your data, you may contact us directly at
rights.commitment: We are committed to addressing your request in a timely and respectful manner.

contact.title: Contact
contact.paragraph1: If you have any questions, concerns, or would like more information about our privacy practices, feel free to reach out.
contact.paragraph2: We are fully committed to maintaining open and honest communication. Please write to us at:
contact.response: and we will do our best to respond promptly.
